xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('BasicRightFilters.BasicRightFiltersClass')) #set ($discard = $services.localization.use('document', 'BasicRightFilters.BasicRightFiltersTranslations')) (% class="xform" %) ((( #if ($context.display == 'edit') ; <label for="BasicRightFilters.BasicRightFiltersClass_0_active">$doc.display('active')$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('active', false, false))</label> #else ; <label for="BasicRightFilters.BasicRightFiltersClass_0_active">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('active', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('active') #end ; <label for="BasicRightFilters.BasicRightFiltersClass_0_Label">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('Label', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('Label') ; <label for="BasicRightFilters.BasicRightFiltersClass_0_Code">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('Code', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('Code') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
